features: Firm Fixation: the tightness of our 5 colors is different, yet it doesn’t affect the use, this towel band is applied to fix the beach towel on the beach chair; It can firmly fix the towel and is windproof so that the towel will not easily fall to the ground and get dirty

Elastic Rubber: the beach towel band is mainly made of rubber material, which has high elasticity, can adapt to the size of most beach chairs, is not easy to deform, reusable and essential for you to go to the beach or swimming pool

Colorful: the pool chair towel holders have 5 colors, including green, dark blue, red, yellow and black, 2 for each color; You can choose your favorite color to match with the towel, which will make the whole look well and help you quickly identify your chair position

Suitable and Portable: the chair band is approx. 30 x 5 cm/ 11.81 x 1.97 inches, and the circumference is 60 cm/ 23.62 inches, when you stretch it, the length can be expanded by 1.5 times, the elasticity is sufficient; It can also be folded into a roll for your convenience

Multi Purpose: the windproof towel holder can be applied to fix not only towels on beach chairs but also notebooks, papers, books and other daily necessities, which is also suitable for outdoor activities such as swimming pools and camping
description: Features: Ideal for traveling: The chair rubber band is elastic and folding, so you can easily put them in your storage box or luggage. They won't add burden or take much space, convenient for you when you are going to travel. Send others to show your kindness: You can give the towel strap to friends or relatives around you who like to go to the beach and sunbathe. They need something to avoid slipping or shifting of the towels, and this band is an ideal choice.
